Perfect for curling, straightening, cutting, or coloring hair, these sectioning clips are also practical for holding bangs while applying makeup, washing your face, working, or exercising.
Rounded edges ensure that these salon clips don’t snag or pull out hair. The lightweight build adds to the comfort, making them ideal for all-day use without strain.
